name: Retro Hoops - Slam Dunk Basketball League
name_original: Retro Hoops - Slam Dunk Basketball League
description:
Get ready to Slam Dunk with the awesome 'Retro Hoops' Game for iPhone & iPad!
Featuring 6 Fantastic Hoop Themes To Play including street and a crazy retro-arcade theme and many more!

~ 6 Different Balls To Match The Theme!

~ 3 Different Game Modes!* Classic, 3 Point or Progressive!

~ Universal App - iPhone, iPad & iPod Touch!

So what are you waiting for? It's time to score some hoops!

*Free version comes with 1 Game mode, you can unlock the game modes via in-app purchase!
